title: [Garden of Destruction]
description: Devoid of living plants, the "garden" is a desolate volcanic wasteland.  Large boulders of glaes-striated tufa sit half-buried in cinders, cracks gaping here and there in the various stones.  Sculpted bronze demonic limbs protrude from the larger crevices, while a large, bronze statue stands crouched in the garden's center.
